title: All demographics
desc: RoboReach serves all demographics! All race, gender, and ethnicity backgrounds are encouraged to apply.

title: No Experience Needed
desc: Absolutely no previous experiencein robotics, mechanical design, or programming is required for RoboReach's common build program!

title: Anyone, anytime!
desc: With both an academic year and Summer program, RoboReach available year-round!
